description.narrative: This activity (Community Land Use Fund Initiative) is a component of Community Land Use Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £5,678,533. This component benefits Mozambique, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society, Agricultural policy and administrative management, Agricultural land resources, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: KPMG Mozambique. The start date is 01-09-2003 and the end date is 31-12-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
